bugs.title: CVE-2019-10877 teeworlds: integer overflow in function CMap::Load() in engine/shared/map.cpp [fedora-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2019-10877 teeworlds: integer overflow in function CMap::Load() in engine/shared/map.cpp [fedora-all]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2019-10877 teeworlds: integer overflow in function CMap::Load() in engine/shared/map.cpp

long_desc.thetext:
In Teeworlds 0.7.2, there is an integer overflow in CMap::Load() in
engine/shared/map.cpp that can lead to a buffer overflow, because multiplication
of width and height is mishandled.

Reference:
https://github.com/teeworlds/teeworlds/issues/2071

Created teeworlds tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1697889]

Created teeworlds tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: epel-7 [bug 1697891]

This CVE Bugzilla entry is for community support informational purposes only as it does not affect a package in a commercially supported Red Hat product. Refer to the dependent bugs for status of those individual community products.

bugs.title: CVE-2019-10878 teeworlds: out-of-bounds write in functions CDataFileReader::GetData() and CDataFileReader::ReplaceData() resulting in remote code execution [fedora-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2019-10878 teeworlds: out-of-bounds write in functions CDataFileReader::GetData() and CDataFileReader::ReplaceData() resulting in remote code execution [fedora-all]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2019-10878 teeworlds: out-of-bounds write in functions CDataFileReader::GetData() and CDataFileReader::ReplaceData() resulting in remote code execution

long_desc.thetext:
In Teeworlds 0.7.2, there is a failed bounds check in CDataFileReader::GetData()
and CDataFileReader::ReplaceData() and related functions in
engine/shared/datafile.cpp that can lead to an arbitrary free and out-of-bounds
pointer write, possibly resulting in remote code execution.

Reference:
https://github.com/teeworlds/teeworlds/issues/2073

Created teeworlds tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1697920]

Created teeworlds tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: epel-7 [bug 1697921]

bugs.title: CVE-2019-10879 teeworlds: integer overflow in functions CDataFileReader::Open() in engine/shared/datafile.cpp [fedora-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2019-10879 teeworlds: integer overflow in functions CDataFileReader::Open() in engine/shared/datafile.cpp [fedora-all]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2019-10879 teeworlds: integer overflow in functions CDataFileReader::Open() in engine/shared/datafile.cpp

long_desc.thetext:
In Teeworlds 0.7.2, there is an integer overflow in CDataFileReader::Open() in
engine/shared/datafile.cpp that can lead to a buffer overflow and possibly
remote code execution, because size-related multiplications are mishandled.

Reference:
https://github.com/teeworlds/teeworlds/issues/2070

Created teeworlds tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1697933]

Created teeworlds tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: epel-7 [bug 1697934]
